metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20162 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: In asn1_p256_int of crypto/asn1.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-223492713References: N/A

criterions.comment: runc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
